page.title: 13OUR SCHOOL SYSTEM
page.content: IN SHETLAND THE TOTAL NUMBER OF PRIMARY SCHOOLS IS THIRTY-FIVE AND THERE ARE EIGHT JUNIOR HIGH SCHOOLS. THE JUNIOR HIGHS ARE: {SANDWICK,SCALLOWAY,BALTASOUND, {SYMBISTER,SKERRIES,AITH, MID YELL AND {BRAE.} CHILDREN WHO HAVE FINISHED SEVEN YEARS OF PRIMARY SCHOOL GO STRAIGHT TO THEIR JUNIOR HIGH.WITH THE EXCEPTION OF BELL'S BRAE,SOUND,FOULA,FETLAR AND BRESSAY WHO GO TO THE ANDERSON HIGH SCHOOL WHICH IS THE ONLY SIX-YEAR COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL IN SHETLAND.IF YOU ATTEND A JUNIOR HIGH YOU MUST LEAVE AFTER FOUR YEARS AND GO THE ANDERSON HIGH SCHOOL IF YOU WANT TO CONTINUE YOUR SCHOOLING.YOU MAY HOWEVER LEAVE THE JUNIOR HIGH AFTER TWO YEARS AND GO ON TO THE ANDERSON HIGH SCHOOL.
